def run(self):
        import numpy as np
        import pyworld
        while True:
            idx, x, res_f0, n_cpu, ts = self.inp_q.get()
            f0, t = pyworld.harvest(
                x.astype(np.double),
                fs=16000,
                f0_ceil=1100,
                f0_floor=50,
                frame_period=10,
            )
            res_f0[idx] = f0
            if len(res_f0.keys()) >= n_cpu:
                self.opt_q.put(ts)
